title.narrative: COMMS ADVOCACY AND PARTNERSHIPS

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance, and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: the Pacific Multi-Country Programme is effectively designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened communication for development (C4D) and sports for development capacity of key partners and expanded partnerships and staffing needs in preparation for the new Multi-Country Programme to further integrate C4D into programmes. Partnerships were developed for key advocacy priorities. | Status:Met | As-of Date:15/12/2017
